synopsis.text: Sore ga Seiyuu! follows three young voice actresses trying to make it in the competitive world of anime voice acting. The main character, Futaba Ichinose, is an enthusiastic rookie still searching for her breakthrough role. Eager to improve her skills, she rubs shoulders with industry veterans and attends numerous auditions and training sessions. Futaba soon befriends two other aspiring voice actresses - Ichigo Moesaki, an aspiring idol who envisions herself as a singing, dancing seiyuu sensation, and Rin Kohana, a seasoned child actress balancing both school and her career. Together, the three girls form a voice acting unit called Earphones and support each other as they navigate the ups and downs of the entertainment world. With Futaba facing a crucial assessment from her agency coming up, she races against the clock to land more roles and prove her talent before it's too late. Sore ga Seiyuu! offers a fun and sincere look at the dedication and passion needed to make it behind the microphone as an anime voice artist. By following Futaba on her journey, viewers get a glimpse at both the challenges and rewards that come with achieving one's dream career.
